title: instant series loss
body: I was in my first game in my series and I lost and it told me I lost my series. I wasn't allowed to play my second game. why would it instantly demote me?

replies.body:
As Deep Terror Nami mentioned, a dodge during a promo series will count as a loss as well as make that series ineligible for the promo helper feature. Complete details on Ranked Play can be found [in our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Did you dodge a match? Dodging during your series counts as an automatic loss.
